Description: Furniture Moving Team leader CONTRACTOR shall Furniture Moving Team Leader experienced in all furniture moving services, tools, equipment, and techniques, scheduling the workload of moving crew, estimating the moving man- hours. Furniture Moving Team leader reporting to Furniture Moving Supervisor with a leadership capability to lead the entire furniture moving team, activities and requirements.Skills
Skills:
. Have minimum of a high school diploma or equivalency.
. At least two (2) years in a supervisory role with demonstrated leadership capabilities
. Have a safety certificate in basic requirements of utilizing tools and equipment of moving furniture.
. Be able to communicate in Arabic and/or English language with the SAUDI ARAMCO representative and the language common to CONTRACTOR personnel.
. Be courteous to the customers and patrons and shall have interest in people when asked for guidance.
